评论详情: Update: Added a star because despite all of the problems listed below, my wife uses this constantly as a housecoat so it does have some utility.  This is not really a cloak as it has sleeves, nor is it a proper coat. The material is very thin and seems like it is not very durable, nor would it be effective at protection from the elements. It is a good looking accessory for some sort of ambiguous cosplay or LARP or Halloween costume, but is not very functional or warming at all. The description says "renaissance" but I challenge you to find a renaissance period garment with this pattern or design. Note the description also says "cotton" as the material but this is plainly not cotton, and the tag says "100% Polyester."

My expectations weren't high for this garment as it's obviously meant more as a novelty item/costume rather than something for everyday wear, but I was still disappointed. The fabric is ridiculously thin and feels VERY cheap. I know from experience with similar fabrics that t's also of the type to really wrinkle easily and be difficult to get the wrinkles out.  I also can't believe how cheap and unsuitable the zipper is. I use to work in a fabric store and it's comparable to the industrial type we sold by the yard for use in things like upholstery covers. It's heavy with chunky metal teeth and the glide is very rough feeling. It's ridiculous to have used it for a garment closure.  About the only good thing I can say is that it is true to size.
Technically looks like the photo but the material feels low quality. Fits small - definitely recommend sizing up.
